values:
Today was the greatest day ever! Jess came down and it started to rain. So we stood out in the rain and got drenched! lol Then we came in side and listened to some music and Jess wrote an email to Rachel. lol Then we ate and went to the basketball court afterwards and talked to Mike. We walked around alittle and sat and talked. Then her mom came and got her. It was a great day all in all. 

Later dad stopped in and gave me my paycheck. Tomorrow I don't have to work! But I'll be totally bored!! Jess starts work tomorrow! Good luck Jess!! Well ttyl
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/9776.html

So since the last time I've updated this nothing new has really happened. I mean I'm still working at World of wheels and down at the farm as much as possiable. We're getting close to moving in. Get this.....my dad gives the bedroom with the "secret stairway" so that way when I come home really late after being out with friends I can sneak upstairs and not wake him up. lol Thanks dad....I hope you know what your doing! 19 more days until I'm sixteen!!! Then I can drive! O yea.....Five more weeks and I get the braces off!! I think I'm  more excited about that! 

So yesterday was the best day every for me for awhile. Jess came down to borrow my movie and she wanted to go for a walk, so we walked down to the new store. She was so nice she bought me a drink since it was so hot! Then we walked back to the church and sat and talked for like 20 mins. It was really nice to see an old friend and be able to talk to her about everything and anything. Devon if you read this sorry I haven't been able to call ya....I've been kinda busy and I guess you have been too. Congrats on the new gf!!!! Hope it lasts a long time!

So that ends the story of my boring pathetic life. O I'm also going to Ocean City, Maryland for vacation for my b-day this year. Hopefully! Other than that nothing. Well ttyl
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/9630.html

It's been for ever since I updated this! So I'm on summer vacation!!! Not that it's great or anything.......cuz it's not. I've been working all summer. I work at World of Wheels now! Which I am very proud of!! My dad has the farm now and we've or I should really say he has done alot of work to it, but there is still alot more to go. I turn 16 in about a month!!! I already have my truck and I've been working on it here and there. It's a beast!! 

So I really was hoping for a life changing summer........but it's been nothing but crap. No friends, no fun, all work. The more I think about it.......the more I don't even want to be here. My gf is shade. We haven't gotten together at all. I talk to her sometimes. Devon and I haven't talked at all......I figure he's hanging out with garrett. O well....my life story. Eveybody leaves me. I feel like that fairy tale about the golden touch only I have the opposite. Everything or everyone I touch I hurt or they leave me. Let's face it....I'll be alone forever. I'll never find that perfect girl. There is no such thing! Once upon a time there was one but that's in the past with the rest of my regrets. You know....there's a saying that goes...never dig a whole you can't get out of. I should of listened to that saying alittle closer. O wait here's my fav.........you never know what you have till it's gone. Yea that one get's me everytime.
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/9426.html

Wow it's been awhile since I last updated this! Well alot has happened since then. I really don't know where to start. I know........the best thing to ever happen to me.....Rachel!!! She really is! Everytime I need a lift when life gets me down she's there for me.......I actually found someone sweeter than me!! lol The best part.....she's a christian! She calls me Banana's....hehe! Our song is Bless the Broken Road. Since god blessed the broken road so we could find each other! I don't know where I would be with out here!!! I love her to death!! When I get out of highschool I'm going down to NC to collage and meeting up with her! I can't say enough about her!!




OK!!! Someone plzzzz tell me where it says I'm going out with Rachel???? Guess I totally missed it or else I can't read!!!!!!!! Does that clear it up for everyone????
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/8966.html

Wow it's been awhile since I last updated this! Well alot has happened since then. I really don't know where to start. I know........the best thing to ever happen to me.....Rachel!!! She really is! Everytime I need a lift when life gets me down she's there for me.......I actually found someone sweeter than me!! lol The best part.....she's a christian! She calls me Banana's....hehe! Our song is Bless the Broken Road. Since god blessed the broken road so we could find each other! I don't know where I would be with out here!!! I love her to death!! When I get out of highschool I'm going down to NC to collage and meeting up with her! I can't say enough about her!!

My dad got the farm. It's not in as bad of shape as we thought it was! There sure is alotta work that needs to be dun though! I'll be busy this summer! He's also working at world of wheels! Guess who else is too? ME!!! Yea it's awesome!! I love it! I quit McDonald's and that's my new place! 

I went on a Japanese field trip Wednesday and it was awesome!! We went to this musuem that was kinda boring but it had a bunch of Japanese artifacts. We then went out to eat at a chinese restaurant where I ate duck and crab. It was pretty good! I didn't dare try the octopus! lol Afterwards they gave us a hour and a half to shop!! It was so great! Only about 19 days left of school! Can't wait! 

Tonight we went out to my grandparents to celebrate my grams bday. We had cake and all that. Then I came back home and talked to Rachel for 2hours! I love her!! She is the best! Well tomorrow we're having an all night bowling party.........well it's until about midnight. Then I have to get up and go to work at 9. I'm going to the races saturday night and working all day sunday. But it'll be my last day working! So I'm glad!! Well talk to ya'll later!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/8744.html

Today was messed up. I went to school where I just didn't have the greatest day. I mean nothing went right....just a bad day. It was so long.

I came home and my little cuz is in the hospital with strept throat and he's dehidrated or however you spell it. But anyways he's gonna be ok but he's not at his greatest. On top of all of that his mom (my aunt) was recently in a car accident and his dad(my uncle) has pink eye. I feel so bad. Like my grandma says....god only does that kinda stuff to the people he really loves. 

Well then my dad, sis and me went to the movies. That was fun....we enjoyed it. But my mom is being such a you know what. And she's always saying stuff about dad so my dad was upset about all of that. To top it off....on our way home there was an ambulence and a fire truck in our field at the track. Some kid wrecked but he was ok. I was worried that something serious happened. 

So after all this I went for a walk to clear my head. I can't even think straight anymore. I don't know what's wrong and what's right anymore. I just need it all to stop. It seems like I can never catch up. I think I'm finally getting ahead in life then all this other crap happens....and I just can't win. This year has really sucked....I mean bad!!! I hate '05!! But I look at it......and it could be much worse....but it's not over yet. Let's hope it gets better. Night
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/8586.html

Hey ya! Sorry it's been awhile since I've talked in this thing. Well not a whole lot has happened since who knows when. 

Um....where do I start. Just Saturday I had my quad down at my house and a couple of my friends all went riding on my tack in my field. It was really awesome! I worked Sunday. It was so hott!!

Speaking of hot....we've been having awesome weather here!!! I love it!! I wish it was like this all of the time! School is still boring as usual! Can't seem to get that place to just blow up! Still got my wonderful gf! hehe she's awesome! Well hey gtg....ttyl
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/8240.html

Hey Ya'll!! Boy today was crazy! The periods were all messed up in school today! Sam brought in his video of Wrestlemania and I watched that tonight! That was awesome!! It was a long hard day....just like any other day! Jess and I had a laugh last night.....we made up and we're friends again. I just wish chels would quit being.....well chels. I don't know what her problem is. I was only nice to her. 

So then I came home and watched the movie.....and then went for a walk! It was great!! It was so warm!! Tomorrow it's suppose to be even better!!! Well for the best news! I finally did get a new gf! Her name is Rachel from North Carolina!! So yea that's pretty kewl! I'm real happy! 

You know.....I can't go anywhere without being made fun of......picked on.....anything! I tell them how it is....but that don't help. I'm gonna have to start kicking some ass. I mean fer real....even my family makes fun of me. What did I ever do? Well I hope everyone enjoys there laugh....cuz when I leave....and I make something of my self......they'll all change there minds. I'm out
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/8048.html

Hey ya! So today was interesting! When I woke up there was three inches of snow on the ground!! gezzz I went to work this morning but had a hard time getting there. First there was a powerline down on the road so we had to take this back road if that's what you want to call it. It was bad....then there was this wreck and this guy flipped his truck over on his roof. I finally got to work and I kept busy today! With all the snow we kept busy! Then I came home and relaxed a little. 

I talked to Rachel most of the night!! She is so awesome...get this...she likes Kurt Busch!! She likes nascar and actually worked at Lowe's motor speedway for a little bit!! That is so awesome! We are both late Dale Earnhardt fans too. 3 Forever!! We both had to work today from nine to five and she keeps a journal too just like me! She writes about me! hehe She does yoga. That would be kewl...I would probably die with all the streching though! lol 

Ok here's the best part. Chels is mad at me and not talking to me! Whoa! Surprize! Not really. But we had this big fight , o and jess was in on it too. Told me too go suck a cactus. ????? whatever....but yea so now she doesn't want to talk to me. Jess will be spreading stuff about me tomorrow too....I know cuz she's done it before....and they wonder why I want to find friends away from here?!?!?! O well....this thing with chels is so childish. It's ok cuz she's friends with all of the popular kids in her grade. haha that still makes me laugh...but anyways Night to ya'll
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/7931.html

Today was SO boring! It rained all day!! I didn't really go out much because it was cold and wet! I wanted to enjoy today because I have work tomorrow which sucks real bad! Then it decided to snow and these were real big flakes!!! 

So now I sit here listing to music and talking to Rachel. My new friend from North Carolina!! That's where I might be going this summer! Two more months of school left!! Yes!! O yea......I got new neighbors! Kristen Rose moved in across the road from me today. Joy. Not really but it'll be something different! I'd rather have corey and all them back over there! I kinda miss that annoying little kid! He was kinda like my little brother. Well hey ttyl
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/7589.html

Today didn't really feel like april fools day! I mean no one really played any tricks. I guess we are all to old for that. Although Eli and Trevor pretended to fight in chours today! They did a pretty good job....I almost believed them! 

I came home and really didn't do much! I hung out side for alittle bit because we had another really nice day! It wasn't as warm today though! I set up my grandma's computer for her today. Mine is still better!! But any ways I finally got to talk to STEPH!!!! It was 7:30 here and 10:30 over there. So yea. She's awesome!! She went to the beach and took pics for me of the beach! I can't wait till I get them!! Well I'm out!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/7400.html

Today was lousy! School was so boring and I hate it as usual! I come home and I have an ortho app. I hate the dentist or anything to do with messing with my mouth!! I spent all day in Clarion because of my grandparents! So I got home just in time for a little walk before the sun went down! 

I get on the computer and fight with the greatest person I know! Even though I know alot of people who would beg differ.....she is the best! I'm sorry chels for what I said...if it's easier to just walk away then do it. I mean it's nothing new.....this whole year I've been losing people that mean the most to me. o well.....ttyl
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/7108.html

Today was awesome!! No nothing happened but the weather was just awesome!! School was ZZZZZZZ as usual! Nothing new ever happens! I wish it would just blow up with the rest of some things!

But I came home and I was outside the whole time!! Tiff, Amanda and I went for a walk with our dogs......then just us! Then I came home and worked. I was suppose to call Shade cuz she wanted me too and I totally forgot!! I guess I have alot on my mind. But I grabbed my cell and called her twice and she wasn't home. Later Amanda and I walked our dogs in the dark! lol that was great! Every play chicken with cars? lol Then we just messed around outside! I'm gonna miss this weather! It's suppose to rain and be 56 tomorrow! grr Well hey talk to ya'll later!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/6792.html

Back to school today! O joy! I hated it! But I did get lucky and walked out of there without homework even though I missed thursday. So life is great and bad at the same time. I have met this great girl from Austraila that everyone either says she's lying....or a grandma getting her kicks!! So now chels is kinda upset with me....says I've changed alot! I really don't think I have......I don't feel any different. So yea I don't know what I'm going to do. I really ain't gonna worry about it. I'm gonna do what I do best......do what makes me happy and scew everyone else! well hey everyone have a great day! Night!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/6495.html

Today was SO boring!!! I didn't do anything all day!!! I watched The Ghost of Mr. Chicken and surfed on the computer! I talked to some friends. Then my sis and I had the house to ourselves for a little bit. 

My mom came home and we went to her house and had dinner. I got on her computer(it's so slow!! and mine is older!) and I emailed my friends! So yea that's my day! I know.........I need to get a life! Well talk to ya'll later!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/6346.html

Today was so long!! I wanted it to be over because work was SO slow today! They were nice though because they let me off early! Then I came home and talked to my dad and grandma and grandpa! It's nice to just sit and talk to them. You can learn so much! But the best part is I didn't get to see my annoying cousins! lol Me and Steph both agree we have annoying cousins! 

Chels told me how I should of been in church today and not working!! I know chels I know! I would of liked to have gone to church today but of course work! Well I'm listing to Steph's fav song Ocean Avenue.....and it makes me think of all the good times I have with my friends! Staying up late goofing off! Well hey ttyl
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/5999.html

Hey ya'll! So today was ok! This morning I got up and went for a walk! Amanda Tiffany and I all went and we took our dogs! It was nice to get out in the fresh air! So cold and early in the morning! It felt good since I woke up not feeling good....all day I kinda felt crapy till tonight when I went for another walk with amanda and finally talked to Steph! She said now everytime she goes to the beach she always thinks of me.......and I remind her of the ocean! So now when she looks out into the ocean.......she thinks of me. It's so awesome to know someone out there is thinking of you! Some day I'll go to Austraila and take that walk with Steph down the beach! Chels if your reading this.....I know...but hey anything is possiable.

So tomorrow is Easter! But I work all day!! So I don't get to celebrate easter! For all of you who do.....enjoy and think of me at my long boring job!! Well hey, I'm out! Night
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/5715.html

Today was ok! I mean it wasn't all that boring! I got up this morning and didn't really do much! Just kinda relaxed around the house! Then later my mom, dad and I all went to Clarion and shopped. I just walked around the malls and looked. Then we came home and went out to my moms.

We had dinner and watched some tv. Then my mom bought this ear piercing kit and she pierced my ear!! We colored some eggs for easter and watched the Charlie Brown speical. Then I highlighted my hair!! It's now copper! It's awesome! I think so! Then I just came home and got on the computer! 

So that's my day. I do have to appologize to chels for annoying her! lol Hey chels.....I can dream...right?? Well ttyl Night!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/5446.html

Hey everybody!!! I'm back! I mean I have my puter back! We had school today and I opted to not go and took the day off. We had half a day anyways. So I went this morning and got my comupter! Then we stopped in a McDonald's and got a couple shakes and a couple for my dad and some guys at work! So we ran them down there afterwards. Then I came home and relaxed and setup my computer! So all in all it was a good day!!! Long weekend now! It'll be nice! Hey if anybody reads this my new username is XxcountryxX27. So add me and we can talk! 
Well ttyl!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/5192.html

It's been a while since I updated this thing. I think! Well if anyone bothers to read this my puter is broken! It's getting fixed and I'll have it back tomorrow! So those who miss me (no one) I should be back on tomorrow! Speaking of tomorrow.........I'm taking the day off!!! I'm not going to school........I mean we have a short day and I won't miss anything!!! But tonight I'm on my mom's computer and I'm spending the night here! 

So I have some new exciting news!! I made three new friends!!!! Bethany from Texas, Dawn from Missouri and Steph from Austraila!!! There all awesome! They all like country music and are all really kewl! I've been talking to them and it's funny how all of our life styles are all different! I mean Dawn is from the city where everything is fast pace and she doesn't have time to stop and relax.........she's always on the run. Where back here we're slow and laid back! Quite kewl! I haven't really gotten to talk to Steph to much! But I can't wait!! I want to go to Austraila some day!! That would be awesome!! 

Well Tomorrow I stay home and get my puter back!!! Night!!! 

P.S. I love you Chels!!! Sweet dreams! Night!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/4864.html

It's been alittle bit since I updated this thing. I guess I've been busy or just lazy. I really don't have a reason to be on here anymore so I guess that would be the case. So I haven't really done much. I went to work sunday and got payed. It was pretty nice paycheck if I do say so my self. I have to work easter sunday which to me is ok. I mean I'll just be missing a big dinner and being with the family and church. So yea.

Speaking of work........I get to think alot while I'm cleaning. I step back and look at my life. I'm always comparing myself to other people. But when I really think about it.......I'm a pretty lucky kid. And I thank god for being so good to me. I know god has his reasons for me losin jess and not having a gf. He has something better in store for me. Something that I'll look back on and say I wouldn't change a thing. Until then.......life goes on. I also realized what parents say by I wish I could go back to school. I thought they were nuts!! But not that I have a job...I see what they mean. I wish the week would last forever and I wouldn't have to go to work. Just being with my friends and joking around all the time in school beats cleaning all day. I'll hate it when I graduate and leave school. But I'll be happy to move on to something bigger and better.

So I hate it that my mom chooses my life for me. I mean I can't do something without her being there saying nope and then picking what is best for me. I hate it.......I can't do something without her saying something and then making my decision for me. GRRR

Well I've talked to much already. Night
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/4700.html

So today was long and boring. Nothing really happened. It was a regular boring day. It just seemed to drag on.

So my bus driver got a new bus today. It's really nice. But the seats are smaller and closer than the older one. So I have a hard time sitting in them. And it smelled like new! I hate that smell!!! lol I didn't wear a coat today cuz it was pretty warm!! I love it!!! All the snow is almost gone! I'm excited! But my gram says we still have our onion snow and easter snow. So I can't get to excited....more snow is on the way! Darn!!

Today when I got home I was surprized. My mom was here and making dinner. So we ate early!! She got me the new Josh Gracin cd!!!! I love it!!! Got Nothing to Lose is the best song!!! She also got me another game for my PS2 since the other one I bought didn't work but this one doesn't work either. So I'll have to tear it apart and see what I can find. I also got my computer tonight!!! I'm going to take it to Clarion Saturday to get cleaned and setup. I'll have my own computer! It'll be for interent and game use only!! I'll play music and burn cd's too! But I won't put AIM on there! That stupid thing just junks your PC!!

Well Tomorrow is friday!! I'm excited for the first time in a long time!! I don't have to work till Sunday!!! Yes!! Sleeping in! Well ttyl!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/4413.html

Today nothing really happened. It was kinda boring except for lunch. Mike got into an argument with this fag and they started pushing each other. I was waiting for that fag to hit mike. I was ready to crawl across the table and beat the living crap out of him. Mike could of taken him but I was ready and waiting.

So I came home and didn't really do anything. Just kicked back and relaxed. We had nice weather today with the sun shining and it was pretty warm. I'm so excited for spring and summer to come!!! I can't wait!! I don't know if anyone knows this but I love to garden. I help my grandma garden every year. This year I'm gonna have my own garden! I'll give it a shot and see how it goes. I just got done reading a book on the signs of planting. It has to do with the zodiac signs and what days are best to plant.

So that's my day. I know it's pathetic. I have no life but o well. So I think I might go out to my mom's and set up her new computer for her. She wants me to come out.....and I want to go test out the new computer! hehe So it works. Well ttyt! night
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/4332.html

Hey everybody! Another boring day!! What else is new! Well today at school was ok.......Mrs. Lipinchan wasn't there or however you spell her name! So we didn't really do anything. English I sat there and looked stuff up on the internet. 

So I came home and Amanda and I had the house to ourselfs! That was kinda nice. Then at five my mom and dad come and got us to take us out to mom's place. I hate it out there........I just feel lonely out there. I love it here in this little village. It's great!! Out there though I have dish tv, computer and internet all in my room!! So that's pretty kewl. My room looks more like a garage than a room. So we hung out there for awhile......had supper and watched some tv. 

Now I'm back home! I love this little town........I don't know why since it's so dull and boring. Just a great quite little town. Well tomorrow is another day! Night
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/3945.html

Well today was so long!! I had to get up at 8 to get ready for work!!! I started at 9:45 and worked till 5! The day just dragged on! What a way to spend your sunday......and I have to work next sunday 9 to 5 again. It's ok if I get to work with Jake. He's pretty kewl. He tried to get me hooked up with one of his ex-gf. lol He told me to go ask her for her phone number. She was pretty hot but I couldn't work up the courage to ask her......especially in front of her mom. 

I came home and relaxed!! I've forgot how nice it was when I didn't have to work.....but the money is nice too. I watched the race. Kurt finished 3rd! Not bad in his home town!! But his younger brother Kyle finished in 2nd. 

So I got on here and was greeted by Chels!! Your awesome chels........you knew that! lol I have such awesome friends! Well that was pretty much my day. Boring I know but hey......that's my life story! Well ttyl
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/3782.html

So today was pretty good! I didn't really do anything all day.........just sat back and relaxed! I did go outside to sweep the walk way. But besides that nothing.

My dad came and we looked at the race cars in the cranberry mall!! That was pretty kewl. I bought another Tim McGraw cd!! Can you tell he's my favorite?? Then we went a couple of other places and stopped to eat. Amanda was making annoying noises the whole time!! lol....but ya gotta love her. 

So then I came home and messed around. Then got the brillant idea to go sled riding in the dark!! I swear trees just jump out right in front of you! lol But I'm ok! I was told by Ms. Chelsea to be careful! Then when I came in she was all upset......I had her worried sled riding in the dark! lol Your awesome chels! 

So yea that's my day. Interesting and funny one! Well Night!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/3410.html

Part 2 of my snowday

Well the day kinda did get better. I just dumbed around the house and didn't do anything. Then jess wanted me to come play in the snow but it was cold so she called and we talked for like half an hour or so. So I went up there and we watched napolen. That was my excitment for the day. 

I went shopping in butler!! Finally got to go!! I got another Tim McGraw cd!! He's the best!! They had the race car show there too! So I spent most of my time looking at them!! 

Well now I sit here and listen to my cd..........and wonder why?

I remember Sunday mornings
walking on the beach
And that place we'd stop
for breakfast with the 
old red vinyl seats
The hours of the 
tide chart
The way the sunlight
dance upon your face

That antique roller coaster
you just had to ride
I remember how you laughed
at the terror in my eyes
The color and the detail 
Just like it was yesterday

And I remember how you held me 
the night my father died
I didn't have to tell you
I just broke down and cried
You're sewn into the fabric,
the pieces of my life
And I just can't remember
why we said goodbye

Up and down this 
boardwalk lonely people sit
I know it wasn't perfect
but nothin' ever is
The sails out in the harbor
Are searching for the wind

I just had to call you,
I had to hear your voice
and tell you I still
love you
we still have a choice
You're sewn into the
fabric, the pieces
of my life
And I just can't 
remember why
we said goodbye

Everything I do
leads me back to you
I know I just can't let
us go

There must have been
a reason, but I can't
remember now
I know if I could hold you
we could work it out
You're sewn into the fabric
the pieces of my life
And girl let's give it
one more try
Cause I just can't remember
why we said goodbye
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/3191.html

Sorry I haven't updated this! I'm just to lazy and didn't feel like it! Today school is closed which sucks!!! We had that bowling party tonight and I'm pretty sure we won't have it now!! So that kinda makes me mad! But it makes for a long weekend......or course for me I get a regular weekend for once. I still have to work all day Sunday!! 

My mom said she might take us to butler today which would make my day!! I just need to get out of this house and out of this town!! Another school would be nice too! But from what I heard I don't want to go to Keystone......not the best district and all the kids are crack heads! Which I believe.....ever ment any of them?? So today I don't have anything planned except for maybe going to butler! 

Life is back to it's sucky ways again! I stand alone.......no one I really care about! So now the way I look at things.....it's all about me!! I do what I want....my whole life I've been doing what other people want......worring what other people think. What makes everyone else happy......what they like! Now it's what I want.....what I like......what makes me happy!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/2834.html

Hey everybody! Well today was kinda boring.......no Devon. He was sick......he keeps my day interesting! So other than that today was ok! I talked to chels in school for the first time in a long time!!! lol Plus she stopped at my locker......crazy! She's a great friend!

I hope things pick up tempo by the end of the week. It's starting to get boring again.......and I was starting to have a good week! Now it's dull!! Well if the bowling party this week it should get interesting!

You know.....I have alot of people telling me the same thing. I won't tell you what this something is........but I just can't bring my self to believe it. So against all odds and what people think..........I say they are wrong. I guess only time will tell. 

Well let's hope the week gets better!! Night!
http://westfreedom8.livejournal.com/2703.html

Hey ya'll!! Don't ask me why but I had a good day today and I was so happy!! But I don't know why......I think because of this awesome weather we had letting us know summer is coming!!! I love the long nights staying out till nine......watching the sunset.....then having a fire and sit with your friends just talking!!! It's the best ever!!

So yea.......it was just a nice easy day. Nothing new happened. I'm also kind of excited too cuz this friday is the bowling party........and saturday I don't have to work!! On the bus ride up to the bowling party I get to sit with Allie! But on the way back I have to find another seat. 

Jess was feeling crappy today......so I tried to make her feel better on the bus. I don't know if I did or not, but her smile let me know....and it made me feel a whole lot better. I try to make chels feel better too since her and luke are having there moments. My little sis! lol What would I do with out her? 

You know.......it's werid how on the days everyone is down or not good........I have the best day! I hope that isn't a sign.......but maybe it's a good sign or something! That's just like on Friday the 13th.....that's the luckest day of the year for me!! Well with all this happiness and excitment I'm feeling now.....maybe it's a sign something good is going to happen! Let's hope!!! TTYL
